sourcesContent: var e=function(t){if("undefined"==typeof document)return 0;if(document.body&&(!document.readyState||"loading"!==document.readyState)){if(!0!==t&&"number"==typeof e.__cache)return e.__cache;var o=document.createElement("div"),d=o.style;d.display="block",d.position="absolute",d.width="100px",d.height="100px",d.left="-999px",d.top="-999px",d.overflow="scroll",document.body.insertBefore(o,null);var n=o.clientWidth;if(0!==n)return e.__cache=100-n,document.body.removeChild(o),e.__cache;document.body.removeChild(o)}};export{e as scrollbarWidth};
